name: Fatalika: Metaverse Invasion
description:
The Metaverse is under attack. A super computer run by artificial intelligence went rogue and had become self aware after having spent thousands of hours learning from human interactions.

The super computer, in a primitive attempt to understand and imitate humans using AI, decided to duplicate itself within the Metaverse by consuming humans avatars it considers as digital food for being less aware and intelligent than it is. 

Your mission is to infiltrate digital areas of the Metaverse conquered ruled by the super AI computer, and free as much as humans avatars possible from the AI bots.

- Make use of other hand-to-hand and sword fight technics to defeat enemies.

- Increase your power within the game by harvesting mineral.

- Free as much humans as possible, make them either fight enemies or collect minerals for your Meta-Gun.

- Experience intense fight with enemies getting stronger and stronger as time goes by.
